name: Suzanne Awakens
description:
Explore the different levels, triumph over your enemies and reach the Forest’s heart in this action game.

After each level, test your skill by sacrificing your equipment. Sword, cloak or even boots: what will you choose?

It was 15 years ago, when the darkness fell upon the Kingdom of Numelion, that Suzanne proved her courage by slaying the creature’s vicious heart. And this is how this loyal protector of Her Majesty became a legend.

Suzanne awaits you!

IMPORTANT: We're investigating on performance issues for the least powerful PCs.

Controls:
W: up
S: down
A: left
D: right
Left click/K: attack
Right click/Space: dodge

Playable with keyboards arrow
Compatible with a controller
